sentences.english: Impetigo Bacterial inflammatory skin disease, the most common skin infection in children.

sentences.english: Pemphigus is an uncommon autoimmune skin disease.
sentences.chinese: 天疱疮是一种罕见的自身免疫性皮肤病。

sentences.english: Objective To understand allergens in the itch Dermatoses.

sentences.english: Objective To probe into the effective nursing of the patients with sever dermatosis used the exposed therapy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨重症皮肤病患者使用暴露疗法的有效护理。

sentences.english: Objective In order to explore the meanings of direct immunofluorescence test for some dermatoses .
sentences.chinese: 目的为了探讨直接免疫荧光检查对某些皮肤病的意义。

sentences.english: Who knows excuse me, treat the hospital of dermatosis ?

sentences.english: Less commonly, the skin lesions begin as pruritic red macules or papules .
sentences.chinese: 在少数情况，皮肤病损开始于瘙痒的红色斑疹或丘疹。

sentences.english: This is a rapidly emerging area of interest - not only in dermatology.
sentences.chinese: 这种成分迅速起作用，不仅仅在皮肤病区域。

sentences.english: They also are predisposed toward kidney ailments and skin breakouts.
sentences.chinese: 另外，他们也易患肾病和皮肤病。

sentences.english: Massage is not used for dermatosis with pathologic changes and injuries, bruise and scald.
sentences.chinese: 皮肤病病变损害处，皮开肉绽及烫伤处一般不宜推拿。

sentences.english: Treats an illness like resorts to arms, treats skin disease to be also same.
sentences.chinese: 治病如用兵，治疗皮肤病亦一样。

sentences.english: Objective To find out self-rated health on patients with dermatosis and assess clinical effect.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解皮肤病患者的自测健康状况，评估临床疗效。

definition: tinea cruris, fungal skin infection of the groin/dermatomycosis, esp. sexually transmitted/jock itch
common name for 花斑癣, tinea versicolor
